name: Chimaeral Sting
description:
Stings the target, dealing 789 Nature damage and initiating a series of venoms. Each lasts 3 sec and applies the next effect after the previous one ends.

 Scorpid Venom:
90% reduced movement speed.

 Spider Venom:
Silenced.

 Viper Venom:
20% reduced damage and healing.
